sentence.Network_en: She has loyally and unselfishly spent every day at her husband's side.
sentence.Network_cn: 她每天都忠诚、无私地陪在她丈夫身边。

sentence.Network_en: It may be that, so placed, you - being the noble - minded paragon that you are - would behave unselfishly.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许, 你是品德高尚的杰出人物,即使得到了那种位置, 你会表现得毫不自私.

sentence.Network_en: He acted unselfishly when he helped her get the promotion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在帮助她获得晋升时做得非常无私.

Unadorned villagers helped Xiaohua unselfishly , which makes us realize their goodness and laborious virtue ., 朴实的村民对小花的无私帮助 , 让我们看到了劳动人民善良 , 勤劳的传统美德;

entry.def: If you describe someone as unselfish, you approve of the fact that they regard other people's wishes and interests as more important than their own.

example.ex: She started to get a reputation as an unselfish girl with a heart of gold...
example.tran: 她开始被人们赞誉为有一颗金子般的心的无私女孩。

example.ex: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
example.tran: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentences.sentence: "he acted unselfishly when he helped her get the promotion"
